headers.subject: [tosdr:2913] Twitch [Bad] Unclear softening of when twitch may disclose information.

subject: Twitch [Bad] Unclear softening of when twitch may disclose information.
text:
Twitch Privacy Policy
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=privacy_policy

> Twitch also reserves the right to disclose User information that we believe, in good faith, is appropriate or necessary to take precautions against liability; protect Twitch from fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful uses; to investigate and defend ourselves against third-party claims or allegations; to assist government enforcement agencies; to protect the security or integrity of the Twitch Service; or to protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Twitch, our Users, or others.

Twitch may disclose user information to protect itself, others or assist the government.

Unclear softening of when twitch may disclose information.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
